variable.name: act_tau_slow
variable.comment: time constant of slow activation gate

variable.name: act_tau_fast
variable.comment: time constant of fast activation gate

variable.name: kr.act_total
variable.comment: total activation due to slow and fast activation terms

variable.name: kr.inact.n
variable.comment: ratio of molecules in open conformation

variable.name: kr.act_slow.steady
variable.comment: value that n would reach if v_gate was held constant

variable.name: kr.act_slow.n
variable.comment: ratio of molecules in open conformation

variable.name: kr.act_fast.n
variable.comment: ratio of molecules in open conformation

variable.name: l2.i
variable.comment: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

variable.name: l2.v
variable.comment: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

variable.name: l2.use_init
variable.comment: determines whether initial value for v is used

variable.name: kr.inact.tau
variable.comment: time constant for obtaining steady state (i.e. time until difference between n and steady has reduced by a factor of 1/e)

variable.name: kr.inact.steady
variable.comment: value that n would reach if v_gate was held constant

variable.name: kr.act_slow.tau
variable.comment: time constant for obtaining steady state (i.e. time until difference between n and steady has reduced by a factor of 1/e)

variable.name: kr.act_fast.tau
variable.comment: time constant for obtaining steady state (i.e. time until difference between n and steady has reduced by a factor of 1/e)

variable.name: kr.act_fast.steady
variable.comment: value that n would reach if v_gate was held constant

variable.name: kr.i
variable.comment: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

variable.name: kr.v
variable.comment: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

variable.name: vc.stim.i
variable.comment: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

variable.name: vc.v_stim
variable.comment: input voltage (needs to be defined externally)

variable.name: vc.stim.v
variable.comment: Voltage between pin p and n (= p.v - n.v) as input signal

variable.name: vc.v
variable.comment: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

equations.equation:
vc.g.p.i + vc.i - vc.n.i = 0.0
vc.g.p.i
vc.i
vc.n.i
0.0

der(l2.v) = l2.i / l2.c
l2.v
l2.i
l2.c

der(kr.act_fast.n) = (act_steady - kr.act_fast.n) / act_tau_fast
kr.act_fast.n
act_steady
kr.act_fast.n
act_tau_fast

der(kr.act_slow.n) = (kr.act_slow.steady - kr.act_slow.n) / act_tau_slow
kr.act_slow.n
kr.act_slow.steady
kr.act_slow.n
act_tau_slow

der(kr.inact.n) = (inact_steady - kr.inact.n) / inact_tau
kr.inact.n
inact_steady
kr.inact.n
inact_tau

kr.open_ratio = kr.act_total * kr.inact.n
kr.open_ratio
kr.act_total
kr.inact.n

kr.i_open = kr.g_max * (l2.v - kr.v_eq)
kr.i_open
kr.g_max
l2.v
kr.v_eq

kr.i_ion = kr.open_ratio * kr.i_open
kr.i_ion
kr.open_ratio
kr.i_open

kr.g = kr.open_ratio * kr.g_max
kr.g
kr.open_ratio
kr.g_max

kr.act_total = 0.9 * kr.act_fast.n + 0.1 * kr.act_slow.n
kr.act_total
0.9
kr.act_fast.n
0.1
kr.act_slow.n
